title: Buff for Katarina, Yes or no?
body: Well with the DFG removal Kat has a lower burst than she did before and she can still kill an adc in 1.5 seconds flat but i was thinking that maybe she could get a slight buff that if an enemy is slowed or stunned, katarinas w would deal 1.5x damage. I dont know, i wouldn't mind. Lets see what you guys think!

replies.body:
>deal 1.5x damage. 

thats 50% extra damage if she buys rylais LOL

Ummm... Bro? If you haven't sort of noticed, she is kind of broken at the moment. Also, Riot have already announced that she is getting nerfed in the next patch (she was actually meant to get nerfed this patch so yeah) so yeah, I don't think that DFG removal is one of your key issues ATM

Turns out her passive is being "nerfed". I don't believe it is a nerf at all because 9/10 times she is the one getting the kill right then and there anyway, so yeah, I don't see the point in it.

So yeah, Katarina's Passive only gives the CD reduction if a champion died within 3 second of her dealing damage to them.

So say that she jumps onto someone, they flash away, and an Ashe cross-map gets the kill 2 seconds later. it still triggers the passive. However, if a Katarina ults and the enemy Lucian dashes away, and Blitz grabs him, ults him and kills him 4 seconds later, then the passive does not trigger.

Saying that though, when does a Katarina ever not get a kill. I say nerf her hard.

Edit: This is in PBE by the way, so it's not final or official yet, but still...
